comments:
I followed the Servlet tutorial to install xdoclet. I could find nothing obvious
with wrong. The tutorial doesn't say what to download from XDoclet site, so I
picked the XDoclet lib.

Nothing happens in Eclipse to let the user know this process failed. I found out
it was working when I tried to run the servlet. I then back tracked to the Error
Log. Here is one of the bugs reports that I found.

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and it is assumed really fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
